name: UCommonUserInfo
doc: Logical representation of an individual user, one of these will exist for all initialized local players

PrimaryInputDevice: Primary controller input device for this user, they could also have additional secondary devices
PlatformUser: Specifies the logical user on the local platform, guest users will point to the primary user
LocalPlayerIndex: If this user is assigned a LocalPlayer, this will match the index in the GameInstance localplayers array once it is fully created
bCanBeGuest: If true, this user is allowed to be a guest
bIsGuest: If true, this is a guest user attached to primary user 0
InitializationState: Overall state of the user's initialization process

methods.name: GetCachedPrivilegeResult
methods.doc: Returns the most recently queries result for a specific privilege, will return unknown if never queried

methods.name: GetDebugString
methods.doc: Returns an internal debug string for this player

methods.name: GetNetId
methods.doc: Returns the net id for the given context

methods.name: GetNickname
methods.doc: Returns the user's human readable nickname

methods.name: GetPrivilegeAvailability
methods.doc: Ask about the general availability of a feature, this combines cached results with state

methods.name: IsDoingLogin
methods.doc: Returns true if this user is in the middle of logging in

methods.name: IsLoggedIn
methods.doc: Returns true if this user has successfully logged in
